GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the requested article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes property on the requested article, and serves the requested updated article object

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the requested article, and serves the posted comment

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of the comments for the requested article

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the votes property on the requested comment, and serves the requested updated comment object

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of the requested user
